attributes.action: Extend senior civil servants income tax perks to the private sector.
attributes.additional_details: It is a gross immorality that senior civil servants - and at least one of them involved in the murder of over 1000 NHS patients - are being permitted by our dishonourables to evade tax on benefits and perks which people in the private sector cannot also take advantage of.  If this is not to be stopped and full career back taxes clawed back from civil servants then the facility MUST be available to everybody who is a taxpayer.
